text:
[Verse]
Drops falling from the sky
Feel the rhythm as they fly
Heartbeat syncing to the beat
Dancing in the rainy street

[Verse 2]
Puddles form beneath my feet
Waves of joy my heart repeats
Spinning circles lost in time
Raindrops play a perfect rhyme

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Underneath the pale moonlight
Feel the magic in the air
Raindrops wash away our cares

[Verse 3]
No umbrella just the stars
Neon lights pulse from the cars
Streetlight halos we can see
Perfect place for you and me

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Underneath the pale moonlight
Feel the magic in the air
Raindrops wash away our cares

[Bridge]
Every splash a melody
Waltzing with the mystery
In the rain we feel so free
This is where we're meant to be
title: Dancing in the Rain
